channel.title: Blog on Standing DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Standing DevOps

item.title: New blog, new life
item.description: Welcome! This blog has had several iterations over the years. Most of its life was in a self hosted WordPress, a bit in Anchor, a bit in Ghost and finally in Medium. As the continuous experiment that it is, now it’s a mix of Jekyll and Github Pages fronted by the amazing Cloudflare. It’s fun and easy to blog again and I don’t have to pay anyone to host me, so expect a bunch of small posts coming up!
